comment.author: 66124597@N07
comment._content: What's so striking about this image is the appearance of having been shot candidly, catching the subject looking away, lost in her own thoughts, unaware of the camera. But that would be impossible given the state of the art at the time. My first impression on viewing the thumbnail was to suppose it was a series similar to Dorothea Lang's from the Dustbowl, but obviously not:)
